column1: Little Goat Diner////The food... Well. I'm still not sure if I had too high of expectations coming in. We were starving from a small lunch
column2: so we ordered 2 breakfasts and an entree
column3: and a burger. While everything was ...good
column7: pork belly pancake) was super exciting. Everything seemed kind of one dimensional
column8: actually. I was expecting all these unique dishes to be very interesting. Memorable. Something was missing here that is very distinctly present across the street.
